org.grouplens.lenskit.util

Class UnlimitedScoredItemAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.util.UnlimitedScoredItemAccumulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScoredItemAccumulator

    public final class UnlimitedScoredItemAccumulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScoredItemAccumulator

    Scored item accumulator with no upper bound.

        Description copied from interface: ScoredItemAccumulator

        Get the number of items in the accumulator.

        Specified by:
        size in interface ScoredItemAccumulator
        Returns:

      • put

        public void put(long item,
       double score)
        Description copied from interface: ScoredItemAccumulator

        Put a new item in the accumulator. Putting the same item twice does not replace the previous entry - it adds a new entry with the same ID.

        Specified by:
        put in interface ScoredItemAccumulator
        Parameters:
        item - The item to add to the accumulator.
        score - The item’s score.

      • finish

        public java.util.List<ScoredId> finish()
        Description copied from interface: ScoredItemAccumulator

        Accumulate the scores into a sorted scored list and reset the accumulator. Items are sorted in decreasing order of score.

        After this method is called, the accumulator is ready for another accumulation.

        Specified by:
        finish in interface ScoredItemAccumulator
        Returns:
        The sorted, scored list of items.

      • finishVector

        public MutableSparseVector finishVector()
        Description copied from interface: ScoredItemAccumulator

        Accumulate the scores into a mutable sparse vector and reset the accumulator.

        After this method is called, the accumulator is ready for another accumulation.

        Specified by:
        finishVector in interface ScoredItemAccumulator
        Returns:
        A MutableSparseVector of items.

      • finishSet

        public LongSet finishSet()
        Description copied from interface: ScoredItemAccumulator

        Accumulate the scored items into a set.

        Specified by:
        finishSet in interface ScoredItemAccumulator
        Returns:
        The set of items accumulated.
